chapters.title: Chapter 45: Tendrils of Mist
chapters.info: Jain Farstrider, p. 863—Hero of legend. There is a book about him, The Travels of Jain Farstrider, that Mat intends to read but never has. The book is quite popular with his friends, including Elayne, Egwene, Rand, and Nynaeve. He is Malkieri. Jain Farstrider's real name is Jain Charin, also called Noal. He died in the Tower of Ghenjei, distracting the attacking Aelfinn just long enough for Mat and Thom to escape with Moiraine. He has since been bound to the Horn of Valere, and fights alongside the other Heroes. See also Charin, Noal.
